name: LEAD RAIN
effect: After firing its Quad Assault Cannons, the Deluge may create a lead rain zone in the same Line 10 as a free action. This zone ends immediately if the Deluge moves, is destroyed, becomes Stunned or Jammed, or if it fires the weapon again. When a character starts their turn in or enters this zone for the first time in a round, the Deluge automatically deals the Quad Assault Cannons’ Reliable damage to them.

name: REACTIVE DEFENSE SYSTEM
effect: The Deluge and adjacent allies gain soft cover for as long as it’s generating a zone of lead rain.

name: SPIN UP
effect: While the Deluge is in the Danger Zone, its Quad Assault Cannons deal +2 bonus damage, and their Reliable value is increased by 1.

name: MATHUR STOP
effect: When the Deluge clears all Heat, it may choose to receive Heat equal to half its Heat Cap, putting it in the Danger Zone.

name: POINT DEFENSE MODE
effect: The Deluge reorients its frame and shifts into point-defense mode. Until the start of its next turn, the Deluge becomes Immobilized, but it projects a Burst 3 point defense zone around itself. This zone is a lead rain zone that only damages hostiles, instead providing the Deluge and its allies with soft cover and Resistance to damage from ranged attacks.

name: RIDING THE REDLINE
effect: When the Deluge reaches its HEAT CAP, it no longer takes heat from firing its Quad Assault Cannons. It takes heat normally from all other sources.

name: SHEER VOLUME OF BULLETS
effect: Attacks with the Deluge’s Quad Assault Cannons ignore Invisible.

name: SPRAY AND PRAY
effect: Until the start of its next turn, the Deluge’s Quad Assault Cannons gain Inaccurate, but their attack and the lead rain zone they generate become Cone 7.

name: WITHERING HAIL
effect: Characters within the Deluge’s lead rain zone become Impaired, and can’t clear this condition by any means while they remain in the zone.

name: MINING CHARGE
effect: The Lobber can use this weapon as both parts of a Barrage, but the target areas can't overlap. Characters in both areas are attacked only once, but the Lobber may choose from which area.

name: BLAST PLATING
effect: The Lobber has Resistance to Explosive and damage from Blast attacks and systems.

name: INTERESTING CHOICE FOR CQB
effect: The Lobber doesn't receive Difficulty on Mining Charge attacks due to being Engaged if it includes itself in the Blast.

name: COOK OFF
effect: When the Lobber's mech is destroyed, it immediately makes two Mining Charge attacks. Both of these attacks gain +1 Accuracy and must include the Lobber in their Blast; this isn’t a Barrage, so the areas may overlap. The pilot may Eject as part of this process, and definitely should.

name: ASSAULT LAUNCHER
effect: Mining Charge attacks the Lobber makes this turn become Range 15. Any Blast remains the same.

name: EXPERT DEMOLITIONIST
effect: Objects, terrain and deployables in the area of the Lobber's Mining Charge attacks are automatically hit and take 5/8/10 AP Explosive damage.

name: INCENDIARY CHARGE
effect: Mining Charge attacks the Lobber makes this turn deal 3/4/5 Burn instead of their regular damage.

name: KINETIC CHARGE
effect: Mining Charge attacks the Lobber makes this turn gain Knockback 2.

name: OVERSIZE CHARGE
effect: Mining Charge attacks the Lobber makes this turn become Blast 2. Any Range remains the same.

name: SEISMIC CHARGE
effect: Targets the Lobber hits with its Mining Charge attacks this turn must succeed on a Hull save or be knocked Prone.

name: WITNESS ME!
effect: When COOK OFF triggers, the Lobber first moves spaces equal to its SPEED, ignoring reactions and engagement. If Mining Charge is broken, repair it.

name: ANOMALOUS MOTION
effect: The Parallel teleports when they make a standard move.

name: PHASE ECHO
effect: Whenever the Parallel teleports, it creates an echo in the space it previously occupied. An echo is an obstruction the same size as the Parallel, has Evasion 10, E-Defense 10, is destroyed if it takes any damage or heat, and projects the same Threat as the Parallel’s weapons. The Parallel can only have one echo at once; creating a new one destroys the old one. The Parallel also gains the Revert and Achronal Response reactions. It can’t use these reactions if it’s Slowed or Immobilized.

name: REVERT
effect: Effect: The Parallel interrupts the triggering attack and teleports to the space of one of its echoes, destroying it. The attack now targets the new echo it left behind. If part of the same attack also targeted its previous echo, it now targets the Parallel.
trigger: An attack is made against the Parallel.

name: ACHRONAL RESPONSE
effect: Effect: The Parallel immediately teleports to the echo’s space, destroying it, and then uses Skirmish as part of the same reaction, before the hostile character moves. A new echo is created in the space the Parallel previously occupied.
trigger: A hostile character starts movement (including Boost and other actions) inside the Threat of one of the Parallel’s echoes.

name: CRACKED MIRROR
effect: Effect: The attacker must make a Systems save. If it fails, the attack doesn’t occur and the attacker and the target swap position, both teleporting. The attacker must then repeat the attack against themselves.
trigger: A melee or ranged attack is made against the Parallel or one of its echoes.

name: DEATHWALKER
effect: The first time that the Parallel is destroyed each combat, if they still have an echo active, they’re not actually defeated. At the start of the Parallel’s next turn, they teleport to their echo, destroying it and returning to 1 HP. If their last echo is destroyed before their next turn, this trait doesn't function and the Parallel remains destroyed. This doesn’t stack with the Veteran template’s Feign Death trait.

name: DOPPLER
effect: The Parallel moves one of its echoes up to 5 spaces. Echoes are not characters, so this movement ignores engagement and doesn’t provoke reactions.

name: MANNIFEST POSSIBILITY
effect: The Parallel creates an echo in a target space within line of sight and Range 10.

name: SHATTER
effect: Whenever an echo is destroyed, it deals 3/6/9 Kinetic damage in a Burst 1 area.

name: UNCERTAINTY
effect: The Parallel can have two echoes active at once, instead of one. It always decides which of its previous echoes to destroy if it creates a third. If this system is destroyed, an echo of the Parallel’s choice is also destroyed, even if it only has one left.

name: WRAITHSHOT
effect: This weapon makes one extra attack per echo the Parallel has active. Each extra attack originates from a different one of its echoes.

name: COOL HAND
effect: The Slinger gains Accuracy instead of Difficulty from being Engaged.

name: DEATHMARK
effect: When the Slinger scores a critical hit, their target gains Deathmark. A character with Deathmark can make an Agility save as a quick action to remove it.

name: SUN'S ZENITH
effect: Choose any number of characters within line of sight and Range 5 of the Slinger. They each gain Deathmark.

name: RING THE BELL
effect: The Slinger makes a Hand Cannon attack against each character within Range 5 that has Deathmark, then clears Deathmark on those characters. Any character hit by these attacks becomes SLOWED until the end of their next turn. Attacks that score a critical hit can reapply Deathmark.

name: ANOTHER HAND CANNON
effect:
When the Slinger makes an Overwatch attack with another weapon, they can also make an attack with this weapon against the triggering character.
This weapon is considered a Hand Cannon for any traits or systems that refer to one.

name: DARK WIND
effect: Effect: The Slinger makes a Hand Cannon attack against the triggering character. If that character has Deathmark, clear it, and the Slinger’s attack happens first. If the Slinger’s attack hits, the target becomes Impaired until the end of their next turn.
trigger: A character attacks the Slinger with a ranged weapon.

name: DEVIL'S EYE
effect: The Slinger ignores Hidden and Invisible on any character that has Deathmark.

name: DRAW!
effect: Effect: Clear that character’s Deathmark. Until the end of their turn, that character receives +3 Difficulty on any attack that doesn’t target the Slinger.
trigger: A character with Deathmark starts their turn within line of sight and Range 5 of the Slinger.

name: FAN THE HAMMER
effect: The Slinger prepares to unleash a hail of lead. The next attack it makes with its Hand Cannon becomes Cone 5, but doesn’t hit allied characters.

name: IMPOSSIBLE RICOCHET
effect: The Slinger’s Hand Cannon attacks gain Arcing. Against characters with Deathmark, they instead gain Seeking.

name: OUTLAW'S HAND
effect: The Slinger's Hand Cannon, Sun's Zenith, and Ring the Bell are now Range 8.

name: SHOULDNA AUGHTA
effect: Effect: That character gains Deathmark. At T2, this reaction can be used twice per round. At T3, it can be used three times per round.
trigger: A hostile character within line of sight of the Slinger attacks one of the Slinger’s allies.

name: TRUE GRIT
effect: When a character with Deathmark attacks the Slinger, the Slinger gains Resistance to damage, Heat and Burn from that attack. Then, clear that character’s Deathmark.
